ai_summary: The customer rated the experience as average with a 3-star rating and mentioned it was the worst.
ai_actions: Investigate the specific issues mentioned by the customer to understand what went wrong.

ai_user_response: We're sorry to hear that your experience was not up to your expectations. We would appreciate it if you could provide more details so we can improve our services. Thank you!

ai_summary: The customer gave a 5-star rating but described their experience as the worst, indicating a possible discrepancy between their rating and feedback.
ai_actions: Investigate the reason behind the negative feedback despite the high rating
Follow up with the customer to understand their experience better
ai_user_response: Thank you for your feedback. We noticed that you gave us a 5-star rating but mentioned that your experience was the worst. We'd like to understand this better. Could you please provide more details or contact our customer service team?
